name: Ninja Gaiden (2004)
description: The original release for Ninja Gaiden for the Xbox. Where Master Ninja Ryu Hayabusa goes on a quest to recover a stolen sword and avenge the slaughter of his clan. Later rereleased (with DLC) under the title 'Ninja Gaiden Black', and ported as 'Ninja Gaiden Sigma' and 'Ninja Gaiden Sigma Plus'.
